 33
 34template <typename T, typename B1, typename B2>
 35length_type
 36indexbool(const_Vector<T, B1> source, Vector<Index<1>, B2> indices)
 37{
 38  index_type cursor = 0;
 39  for (index_type i = 0; i != source.size(); ++i)
 40    if (source.get(i) && cursor++ < indices.size())
 41      indices.put(cursor - 1, Index<1>(i));
 42  return cursor;
 43}
 44
 45template <typename T, typename B1, typename B2>
 46length_type
 47indexbool(const_Matrix<T, B1> source, Vector<Index<2>, B2> indices)
 48{
 49  index_type cursor = 0;
 50  for (index_type r = 0; r != source.size(0); ++r)
 51    for (index_type c = 0; c != source.size(1); ++c)
 52      if (source.get(r, c) && cursor++ < indices.size())
 53	indices.put(cursor - 1, Index<2>(r, c));
 54  return cursor;
 55}
 56
 57/// Generator functor for ramp.
 58template <typename T>
 59class Ramp_generator
 60{
 61  // Typedefs.
 62public:
 63  typedef T result_type;
 64
 65  // Constructor.
 66public:
 67  Ramp_generator(T a, T b) : a_(a), b_(b) {}
 68
 69
 70  // Operator
 71public:
 72  T operator()(index_type i) const
 73  {
 74    return a_ + T(i)*b_;
 75  }
 76
 77  // Member data.
 78private:
 79  T a_;
 80  T b_;
 81};
 82
 83} // namespace vsip::impl
 84
 85template <typename Predicate,
 86	  typename T1, typename T2,
 87	  typename B1, typename B2>
 88index_type
 89first(index_type begin, Predicate p, 
 90      const_Vector<T1, B1> v, const_Vector<T2, B2> w) VSIP_NOTHROW
 91{
 92  assert(impl::view_domain(v).element_conformant(impl::view_domain(w)));
 93  if (begin > v.size()) 
 94    return begin;
 95  for (index_type i = begin, end = v.size(); i != end; ++i)
 96    if (p(v.get(i), w.get(i)))
 97      return i;
 98  return v.size();
 99}
100
101template <template <typename, typename> class const_View,
102	  typename T, typename B1, typename B2>
103length_type
104indexbool(const_View<T, B1> source, 
105	  Vector<Index<const_View<T, B2>::dim>, B2> indices)
106VSIP_NOTHROW
107{
108  return impl::indexbool(source, indices);
109}
110
111/// Returns values from `source`, at positions given by `indices`.
112template <template <typename, typename> class const_View,
113	  typename T, typename B1, typename B2>
114Vector<T, Dense<1, T> >
115gather(const_View<T, B1> source,
116       const_Vector<Index<const_View<T, B2>::dim>, B2> indices)
117VSIP_NOTHROW
118{
119  Vector<T, Dense<1, T> > result(indices.size());
120  for (index_type i = 0; i != indices.size(); ++i)
121    result.put(i, get(source, indices.get(i)));
122  return result;
123}
124
125/// Copies all values from `source` into `destination`, at the index
126/// given by `indices`.
127template <template <typename, typename> class View,
128	  typename T, typename B1, typename B2, typename B3>
129void
130scatter(const_Vector<T, B1> source,
131	const_Vector<Index<View<T, B3>::dim>, B2>  indices,
132	View<T, B3> destination)
133VSIP_NOTHROW
134{
135  for (index_type i = 0; i != indices.size(); ++i)
136    put(destination, indices.get(i), source.get(i));
137}
138
139/// Generate a linear ramp: :equation:`v[i] = a + i * b`
140///
141/// Requires:
142///   :len: to be output vector size (len > 0)
143template <typename T>
144const_Vector<T, impl::Generator_expr_block<1, impl::Ramp_generator<T> > const>
145ramp(
146  T           a,
147  T           b,
148  length_type len)
149VSIP_NOTHROW
150{
151  assert(len > 0);
152
153  typedef impl::Ramp_generator<T>                             generator_type;
154  typedef impl::Generator_expr_block<1, generator_type> const block_type;
155
156  generator_type gen(a, b);
157  block_type     block(impl::Length<1>(len), gen);
158
159  return const_Vector<T, block_type>(block);
160}
161
162namespace impl
163{
164template <typename Tout, typename Tin1>
165struct clip_wrapper
166{
167  template <typename Tin0>
168  struct clip_functor
169  {
170    typedef Tout result_type;
171    static char const* name() { return "clip"; }                
172    result_type operator()(Tin0 t) const 
173    {
174      return t <= lower_threshold ? lower_clip_value 
175	: t < upper_threshold ? t
176	: upper_clip_value;
177    }
178
179    Tin1 lower_threshold;
180    Tin1 upper_threshold;
181    result_type lower_clip_value;
182    result_type upper_clip_value;
183  };
184  template <typename Tin0>
185  struct invclip_functor
186  {
187    typedef Tout result_type;
188    static char const* name() { return "invclip"; }                
189    result_type operator()(Tin0 t) const 
190    {
191      return t < lower_threshold ? t
192	: t < middle_threshold ? lower_clip_value
193	: t <= upper_threshold ? upper_clip_value
194	: t;
195    }
196
197    Tin1 lower_threshold;
198    Tin1 middle_threshold;
199    Tin1 upper_threshold;
200    result_type lower_clip_value;
201    result_type upper_clip_value;
202  };
203};
204
205template <typename Tout, typename Tin0, typename Tin1, 
206	  template <typename, typename> class const_View,
207	  typename Block>
208struct Clip_return_type
209{
210  typedef
211    const_View<Tout,
212	       expr::Unary<clip_wrapper<Tout, Tin1>::template clip_functor,
213			   Block, true> const>
214    type;
215};
216
217template <typename Tout, typename Tin0, typename Tin1, 
218	  template <typename, typename> class const_View,
219	  typename Block>
220struct Invclip_return_type
221{
222  typedef
223    const_View<Tout,
224	       expr::Unary<clip_wrapper<Tout, Tin1>::template invclip_functor,
225			   Block, true> const>
226    type;
227};
228  
229} // namespace vsip::impl
230
231template <typename Tout, typename Tin0, typename Tin1,
232	  template <typename, typename> class const_View,
233	  typename Block>
234typename impl::Clip_return_type<Tout, Tin0, Tin1, const_View, Block>::type
235clip(const_View<Tin0, Block> v, Tin1 lower_threshold, Tin1 upper_threshold,
236     Tout lower_clip_value, Tout upper_clip_value)
237{
238  typedef impl::expr::Unary<impl::clip_wrapper<Tout, Tin1>::template clip_functor,
239    Block, true> block_type;
240
241  typename impl::clip_wrapper<Tout, Tin1>::template clip_functor<Tin0> functor;
242  functor.lower_threshold = lower_threshold;
243  functor.upper_threshold = upper_threshold;
244  functor.lower_clip_value = lower_clip_value;
245  functor.upper_clip_value = upper_clip_value;
246
247  return const_View<Tout, block_type const>(block_type(functor, v.block()));
248}
249
250template <typename Tout, typename Tin0, typename Tin1,
251	  template <typename, typename> class const_View,
252	  typename Block>
253typename impl::Invclip_return_type<Tout, Tin0, Tin1, const_View, Block>::type
254invclip(const_View<Tin0, Block> v,
255	Tin1 lower_threshold, Tin1 middle_threshold, Tin1 upper_threshold,
256	Tout lower_clip_value, Tout upper_clip_value)
257{
258  typedef impl::expr::Unary<impl::clip_wrapper<Tout, Tin1>::template invclip_functor,
259    Block, true> block_type;
260
261  typename impl::clip_wrapper<Tout, Tin1>::template invclip_functor<Tin0> functor;
262  functor.lower_threshold = lower_threshold;
263  functor.middle_threshold = middle_threshold;
264  functor.upper_threshold = upper_threshold;
265  functor.lower_clip_value = lower_clip_value;
266  functor.upper_clip_value = upper_clip_value;
267
268  return const_View<Tout, block_type const>(block_type(functor, v.block()));
269}
270
271namespace impl
272{
273/// Generic swapping of the content of two blocks.
274template <typename Block1, typename Block2>
275struct Swap
276{
277  static void apply(Block1 &block1, Block2 &block2)
278  {
279    assert(block1.size() == block2.size());
280    for (index_type i = 0; i != block1.size(); ++i)
281    {
282      typename Block1::value_type tmp = block1.get(i);
283      block1.put(i, block2.get(i));
284      block2.put(i, tmp);
285    }
286
287  }
288};
289}
290
291template <typename T1, typename T2,
292	  template <typename, typename> class View,
293	  typename Block1, typename Block2>
294inline void
295swap(View<T1, Block1> v, View<T2, Block2> w)
296{
297  impl::Swap<Block1, Block2>::apply(v.block(), w.block());
298}

300} // namespace vsip
